channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Custom Post Types and Custom Fields creator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Custom Post Types and Custom Fields creator

item.title: CVE-2022-4442|2024-08-03T01:41:44.606Z -- unknown -- custom%20post%20types%20and%20custom%20fields%20creator
item.description: The Custom Post Types and Custom Fields creator WordPress plugin before 2.3.3 does not sanitize and escape some of its settings, which could allow high-privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example, in multisite setup).
